text: Muli nia mee huogodoo ala ne lawa, gei David gaa hana belee haga aloho gi digau o dono hale, gei ogo Michal ga hanimoi belee haga heetugi gi mee ga helekai boloo, “Di king o Israel guu bida hai dono ingoo aamua anga hua gi deia dangi nei! Mee gu haga gila mai ia be tangada dadaulia i mua nia golomada o nia hege ahina o ana gau hai hegau!”6.20 1 Kronikel 16.43
